name: Plantation Bell Tower: Chains that Toll
description: Rust and sugar mold cling to the plantation bell tower; five chains swing like pendulums while cross-marked links click against the coral lime. Kassim grips the iron as Naia tracks the upslope cracks and Maliya counts the toll toward the revenant's wake.
riddle: Add the empty mouth, the hanging tongues, and the marked links—the hour you seek rings without sound.
